item.title: Version 5.6.0
item.description:
Focusmo 5.6.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Smart Logging System: Introducing logging, a new way to stay accountable and track your progress.
    • Add log anytime using global shortcut (cmd + ctrl + l), floating island or command panel
    • Bonus: Convert your logs into structured focus sessions for better analytics instantly from floating island or when creating a log
  • Redesigned Timeline: Timeline interface has been relocated and enhanced within the activity screen for a more intuitive experience
  • Unified Activity Dashboard: A completely redesigned activity view that merges analytics and activity tracking into one comprehensive interface
    • Access detailed activity data for any day
    • Enhanced visualization with improved charts and data presentation
    • Rich insights and analytics to understand your productivity patterns
    • Seamlessly integrated logs within your timeline view
  • Daily Goal Screen: Beautiful chart display for tracking your daily focus goals and progress
  • Floating Island Interface: Introducing a new sleek, minimal floating bar that provides quick access to logging and task creation without disrupting your workflow.
    • Bonus: You can write anything like a motivation quote or reminder to keep you focused
  • Calendar Events in Menubar: See upcoming events with countdown timer and notifications. Easily view and manage your calendar events directly from the menubar.
  • Login using Google: No need to enter license to access your account, just login using your Google account. This creates base for future real-time sync.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed skip button behavior in 1-minute warning - now correctly skips break instead of ending the entire session
  • Fixed: Not able to complete tasks when in paused state
  • Fixed: Activity duration calculation not accounting for overlaps and idle time
  • Fixed: Focus streak calculation
